title: Easy Cheesy Pasta Skillet Recipe
directions: Brown meat in large skillet; drain grease.
Add 2 1/2 cups water. Bring to boil; reduce heat to medium-low.
Stir in pasta; cover. Simmer 15 minutes or until pasta is tender.
Stir in spaghetti sauce and 1 cup of mozzarella cheese.
Sprinkle with remaining cheese; cover. Cook 3 minutes or until cheese is melted.
